TabDescription: Official RedDune Solutions website. Professional technological solutions to help with your projects.

Hero.title: The Right Answer to Your IT Needs
Hero.description: Customized IT solutions for each client. At Reddune Solutions, we provide an integrated and complete service for both individuals and companies. Our focus is on trust, efficiency and transparency. Everything with your complete satisfaction in mind.

ServicesSection.title: Our Services
ServicesSection.description: We offer a complete range of services to address your needs.

tecAssist.title: Technical Support
tecAssist.description: Specialized technical support for computers, consoles and other electronic equipment. We diagnose and resolve issues quickly and accurately, ensuring your device works at peak performance, with the transparency you expect from a professional team.

webDigital.title: Mobile Applications
webDigital.description: Development of native and hybrid mobile applications for iOS and Android.

dataRecovery.title: Software and Recovery
dataRecovery.description: Installation and configuration of software, drivers and operating systems, as well as basic data recovery from lost files. We ensure your equipment returns to working stably, updated and optimized, with all essential programs ready to use and your files recovered whenever possible.

ServicesSection.quote: Didn't find what you were looking for? Our passion is creating tailored solutions. <contactLink>Talk to us</contactLink> and we'll turn your idea into reality.

PortfolioSection.title: Our Portfolio
PortfolioSection.description: A glimpse into our world of solutions and professionalism.

AboutUsSection.title: About Us
AboutUsSection.description: RedDune Solutions is a technology and digital innovation company, focused on providing complete solutions for computer maintenance, electronic equipment repair, and modern and efficient website creation. We combine technical knowledge, creativity, and commitment to ensure quality results tailored to each client's needs. Our goal is to simplify technology and help people and businesses make the most of the digital world.

ContactSection.title: Get in Touch
ContactSection.description: Have a project in mind or need assistance? We're here to help! Get in touch with us and we'll discuss how we can work together to bring your ideas to life.

useToast.successDescription: Thank you for contacting us! We will respond as soon as possible.
useToast.errorDescription: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again later.

PricingPage.title: Plans and Pricing
PricingPage.subtitle: Transparent and flexible solutions for every need.

technical_assistance.title: Technical Assistance
technical_assistance.desc: Fast and effective solutions for your equipment.

web_services.title: Web and Services
web_services.desc: Your digital presence, built with professionalism.

software_services.title: Software and Recovery
software_services.desc: Protect and recover your data and systems.

customProjectCard.title: Didn't find what you're looking for?
customProjectCard.desc: We have custom solutions for complex projects and specific needs.
customProjectCard.text: If your project doesn't fit the above packages, contact us. We'll be happy to analyze your needs and provide a customized quote.
